name: Trash Island (gogoindierangers, ryuteichou, dmellott, LadyLime)
description:
Welcome to Trash Island!

Swim, collect trash, avoid unfriendly creatures, and destroy the factories polluting the waters!

Trash Island is a mobile game available on the Google Play Store and Apple's App Store. For an optimal playing experience, downloading the mobile version and playing on the phone is recommended. 

App Store (iOS): https://apps.apple.com/us/app/trash-island/id1575633809
Google Play (Android): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=gogo.indierangers.trashisland

Game Instructions

Collect as many plastic bottles, tires, barrels and other trash as you can to increase the ammunition that you can use for attacking factories.

Controls Part 1 - Collect

Mouse

* Swim Up - left click above the whale
* Swim Down - left click below the whale

Part 2 - Attack

Mouse

* Left click and hold the trash ball. Drag it to the left and down to aim at the factory and release to attack.
